greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numerator of sum_{p prime, p-1 divides 2*n} 1/p.
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: a[n_] := Sum[ Boole[ PrimeQ[d+1] ]/(d+1), {d, Divisors[2n]}] // Numerator; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 48}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 10 2012 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
